EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.London_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed - Pivotal Analytics Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Analytics Roadshow! Please see your event details below.
Date: Tuesday, 16 May 2017 {{my.Save the Date London:default=edit me}}
Time:
8.30am - 1.15pm Strategy Session 1.15pm - 5.15pm Data Science Workshop Session (Limited Seating and for practitioners only)
Location:
Pivotal London Office 211 Old Street, London, EC1V 9NR (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/211+Old+St,+London+EC1V+9NR,+UK/@51.5259343,-0.090919,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x48761ca61bf76b2d:0x89c21dcce87fd5a1!8m2!3d51.5259343!4d-0.0887303]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
Directions Scaffolding obscures sight lines to The Warehouse from the Old Street Roundabout, but if you persevere through the building site, youâ€™ll find us!
Step-by-Step Directions
- Exit Subway 4 from Old Street Tube Station - Walk up the ramp on your left - Immediately in front of you is an advertisement with "Ceviche" and "Maki"; walk past the sign towards a mini courtyard to the right - Our building's revolving doors are on your left - Enter the building, walk down past the coffee shop and you will find the elevators at the end; we are on the 2nd floor
If you have any questions, feel free to email Phil Reay at <preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
